mapper.select: SELECT NUM, ID, ACODE, ANUM, REGDATE FROM LIKES WHERE 1=1 AND ACODE = #{acode} AND ANUM = #{anum} AND ID = #{id} ORDER BY NUM DESC, REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKES ( NUM, ID, ACODE, ANUM, REGDATE ) VALUES( LIKESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id} , #{acode}, #{anum}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NUM DESC, REGDATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, NUM,ACODE,ANUM,REGDATE,NAME,SUMMARY,THEMECODE FROM ( SELECT A.NUM, A.ACODE, A.ANUM, A.REGDATE, B.NAME , B.SUMMARY , B.THEMECODE FROM LIKES A, CAMPING B WHERE A.ANUM = B.NUM AND A.ACODE = '1' AND A.ID = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT A.NUM, A.ACODE, A.ANUM, A.REGDATE, B.NAME , B.SUMMARY , B.THEMECODE FROM LIKES A, TOURLIST B WHERE A.ANUM = B.NUM AND A.ACODE = '2' AND A.ID = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT A.NUM, A.ACODE, A.ANUM, A.REGDATE, B.TITLE AS NAME , B.SUMMARY , null as THEMECODE FROM LIKES A, COMMUNITY B WHERE A.ANUM = B.NUM AND A.ACODE = '3' AND A.ID = #{id} ) ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM LIKES A, CAMPING B WHERE A.NUM = B.NUM AND A.ACODE = '1' AND A.ID = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM LIKES A, TOURLIST B WHERE A.NUM = B.NUM AND A.ACODE = '2' AND A.ID = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM LIKES A, COMMUNITY B WHERE A.NUM = B.NUM AND A.ACODE = '3' AND A.ID = #{id} )
